scripts.clean:script:build: npm run clean:script && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:copy: npm run npx:tsx -- script/helper/copy-repo-files.ts clean && npx shx rm -rf script/helper/copy-repo-files.ts && npx shx rm -rf copy.repo.config.json
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:package-lock && npm run clean:copy
scripts.clone:repository: shx rm -rf repo && shx mkdir -p repo && git clone https://github.com/MathJSLab/.github.git repo/.github
scripts.copy:repository: shx cp repo/.github/script/helper/copy-repo-files.ts script/helper/copy-repo-files.ts && shx cp repo/.github/resource/mathjslab-www/copy.repo.config.json copy.repo.config.json && npm run tsx -- script/helper/copy-repo-files.ts
scripts.clone:copy:clean:repository: npm run clone:repository && npm run copy:repository && npm run clean:repository
scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm run clone:copy:clean:repository && npm run clean && npm run build:script
scripts.git:all: npm run git:add && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push
scripts.do:all: npm run clean:all && npm run update && npm run build && npm run git:all
